import React, { Component } from 'react'; import googleLogo from "../assets/icon/google-logo.png" import facebookLogo from "../assets/icon/facebook-logo.png" import twitterLogo from "../assets/icon/twitter-logo.png" import { getAuth, createUserWithEmailAndPassword } from "firebase/auth"; import { auth } from '../../firebase_config' class Signup extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {color: "red"}; this.inputs = React.createRef(); this.inputs.current = [] this.addInputs = async (el) => { if (el && !this.inputs.current.includes(el)) { this.inputs.current.push(el); } //this.inputs.Current.push(el) console.log(this.inputs.current) }; this.formRef = React.createRef(); this.signUp = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const signingUp = (email, pwd) => createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth, email, pwd) if((this.inputs.current[1].value.length || this.inputs.current[2].value.length) < 6) { //setValidation("6 characters min") return; } else if(this.inputs.current[1].value !== this.inputs.current[2].value) { //setValidation("Passwords do not match") return; } try { const cred = signingUp( this.inputs.current[0].value, this.inputs.current[1].value ) } catch (err) { if(err.code === "auth/invalid-email") { //setValidation("Email format invalid") } if(err.code === "auth/email-already-in-use") { //setValidation("Email already used") } } } } render() { return (
